data.title: James Cronin Obituary
data.meta_description: James Joseph Cronin, 79, of Lakewood, passed away August 19, 2008 in Kansas City. James was born September 28, 1928 in Kansas City to Stanley Gregory Cronin
data.text:
James Joseph Cronin OBITUARY

James Joseph Cronin, 79, of Lakewood, passed away August 19, 2008 in Kansas City. James was born September 28, 1928 in Kansas City to Stanley Gregory Cronin & Laurena Marie Mollot Cronin. He was a 1948 graduate of Rockhurst College and then Georgetown University Law School. He served in the United States Marine Corps. James was an attorney and lived most of his life in Colorado. In addition to his parents, James was preceded in death by a brother, John V. Cronin, a sister, Catherine A. Tobin, & in 1992, a grandson, Jordan Joseph Valdez. Survivors include his wife, Cynthia Cronin; his children, Jim (Diane) Cronin, Jr., Mary (Chris) Fairall, Mike Cronin, Clare (Tom) Bruno, Laura (Ed) Neuberg, Rita (Wayne) Ponder, Denise (Roger) Waldo, Scott (April) Valdez & Anne (Greg) Penland. Grandfather of David, Sean, Katie, Rita, Jason, Janelle, Terrance, Kelly, Max, Joe, Kelsey, Sara, Michael, Courtney, ZaneAnne, Bobby, Tory, Dalton, Patrick, & Lucy. He is also survived by a sister, Mary C. (Jim) Mackin. Previous spouse of Alice F. Cronin. 16 nieces & nephews. Funeral Mass will be held Wednesday, 10:00AM, St. Bernadette Catholic Church, 7240 W. 12th Ave. Interment, Ft. Logan National Cemetery. In lieu of flowers, donations may be made to Angel Eyes, formerly SIDS Foundation, 425 S. Cherry, Suite 890, Denver, CO 80246 or The Smile Train, 41 Madison Avenue, 28th Floor, New York, NY 10010.
